title: Correspondence with Alliance Defending Freedom International

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Correspondence with Alliance Defending Freedom International
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

- Any digital communications (including but not limited to: emails, text messages) between DRL and Alliance Defending Freedom International staff
(@adfinternational.org) sent between January 20, 2025, and the time this request is processed, including attachments

DRL said on Facebook on March 24 that it had recently met with ADF International 
https://www.facebook.com/StateDRL/posts/pfbid0U1wVfNWRntupnTqtw2dYE2uvxRs9xbznk5SVr1rkftYc9ZhXjWfouutmxxvNeNNPl
DRL said on X on March 30 that Senior Advisor Sam Samson met with ADF International client Livia Tossici-Bolt and was "monitoring" her case
https://x.com/StateDRL/status/1906360389006160338 

I am a journalist doing public interest reporting.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Susan Rinkunas
